text: was a Japanese judoka. Born in Kagoshima, Japan, he received a silver medal at the 1956 World Judo Championships in Tokyo, behind winner Shokichi Natsui. He won the All-Japan Judo Championships three times. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1920 births Category:1988 deaths Category:Japanese male judoka
title: Yoshihiko Yoshimatsu
